catalogId.description: Identifier for the Data Catalog. By default, it is the account ID of the caller.

databaseName.description:
Name of the database for the table. Unique to a Data Catalog.

The following arguments are optional:

name.description: Name of the table. At least one of `name` or `wildcard` is required.

wildcard.description: Whether to use a wildcard representing every table under a database. At least one of `name` or `wildcard` is required. Defaults to `false`.
